summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MOT Platform new features: Gamification system and Career Config. All backend APIs (12/12 tests passed) and frontend pages working correctly. Menu reorganized as expected with Dashboard > Administração > Gamificação > Config. Carreira order.

minor.issue: Intermittent 500 error seen in logs (ObjectId serialization)
minor.note: Appears to be edge case, main functionality works

passed_tests: Menu reorganized correctly: Dashboard > Administração > Gerenciar Usuários > Gamificação > Config. Carreira
GET /api/gamification/ranking - Returns ranking list with positions
Gamification Page (/gamificacao) - Stats cards, Ranking tab, Badges tab, Premiar tab (admin)
Career Config Page (/carreira-config) - Table with 5 levels, edit/delete buttons, create dialog, visual progression
Admin Dashboard (/admin) - Working with charts and user management
critical_code_review_comments: Backend logs show occasional ObjectId serialization error - may need review of MongoDB document handling in edge cases
seed_data_creation: None - used existing admin user and test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features fully implemented and tested: 1) Gamification system with badges, ranking, and award functionality, 2) Career Config page with full CRUD for career levels, 3) Menu reorganized with Administração right after Dashboard. All APIs working correctly. Frontend pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing.
